nodes.text: Zil Topur was a male Quarren official who represented the planet Dac in the Galactic Senate after former Senator Tikkes joined the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

In 22 BBY, Topur served as one of the aides to Senator Tundra Dowmeia, along with Nor Wedd. When Supreme Chancellor Palpatine proposed a number of emergency powers and the formation of the Grand Army, Zil, along with the rest of the delegation agreed to the proposal which led to the start of the Clone Wars.
